Hey, I'm Mel!

I'm a creative specializing in graphic design & illustration. I love finding creative solutions and just generally making things look good.

I also love musicals, LEGO and crafts but that's for another website.

After the 9 to 5, you’ll probably find me creating printable games, designing stationery or drawing the occasional comic.
